attributes.action: Katrina Percy, Southern Health Trust, should be fired and made to pay back money
attributes.additional_details:
Here are a few links regarding the story. She's obviously incompetent and needs to be held to account for her actions.

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-37308857

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-37588815#orb-footer

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-36160553

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-36922039
attributes.background:
Katrina was in charge of the Trust with an insanely high mortality rate. She then arranged a consultancy post for herself and how now resigned from that post and has been given a year's salary. 

She should have been fired years back and the year's salary should be claimed back.
